Example 1: Simple mediaplayer


<div id="example1" swa="Mediaplayer FROM ../data/media/mediafiles.json"></div>
Creates a media player with cover (if available) and download function

Example 2: Mediaplayer with comment function


<div id="example2" swa="Mediaplayer FROM ../data/media/player/mediafiles.json"></div>
Creates a media player with cover (if available) and download function

Example 3: Show a webstream (single picture reload)


                        <div id="example3" swa="Mediaplayer FROM ../data/media/player/streams.json"></div>

Shows a picture and refreshs the picture
Notice for this example: Its nesseserry to run a stream reachable under http://localhost:8081/samplestream to make this example run. You may use VLC player for this purpose.

Example 4: List player

Player with medialist template shows a player list. Clicking an an title starts it.


<div id="example4" swa="Mediaplayer FROM ../data/media/player/musicfiles.json TEMPLATE medialist"></div>

Example 5: Editable playlist

Show player with possibility to remove tracks and save the playlist.


<div id="example5" swa="Mediaplayer FROM ../data/media/player/musicfiles.json TEMPLATE medialist"></div>
            

var player_example5_options = {
    allowDel: true
};
